title: Unable to install truffle in windows
body:

please help me with this error, not able to solve from past 2 days
Can you please try running `npm install -g windows-build-tools` before trying again?
you must be in admin mode ?

> I solved the problem guys

How? Please share

hey @Roshankiller123 can you pls let us know how you resolved?  would be great if you could provide the info to others who are having similar issues.

Thanks
@Elangley101, @webbooo, @Cyber5Tech Please [open a new ticket for your issue](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/issues/new/choose), so we can get it resolved quickly. Thanks!
@Roshankiller123 or anyone can describe the solution ?
